title: Omega Teemo goggles bug
body:
Hi all,
I just came to point out a bug I noticed with Teemo's Omega Squad skin.
When he goes into stealth, his goggles show those green beams from his night vision being on, and I know that when he goes out stealth, the beams are supposed to fade back out. Right now when I play Omega Teemo though, going back out of stealth still keeps the beams sticking out of his goggles, so it looks like he has green bunny ears bobbing around on his head.
Do others have that same issue?

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! This isn't an issue that would be isolated to your computer, it would happen to all players. We're aware of the issue and will be working on a fix. ^-^

**EDIT:** I poked our VFX friend and he's working to get a fix in. :)
Np! Thanks for bringing this up again. I've seen it brought up a bunch in the last week or so. Seems to be a pretty easy fix. :)
